This can take several pulls and 
usually involves an episiotomy 
to help reduce the risk of you 
tearing. 
Ventouse delivery
Your obstetrician will place 
the ventouse cup onto your 
baby’s head.  The cup may be 
attached to a special vacuum 
machine or to a hand-held 
suction pump that creates a 
vacuum seal between the cup 
and your baby’s head.
Your obstetrician will make 
sure that none of your vaginal 
skin is caught in the vacuum 
seal.  Your obstetrician will 
guide y
